description.zh-cn: 中国商人，中共八大元老之一习仲勋的外孙女，习近平的姐姐齐桥桥的女儿，即习近平的外甥女。她持有香港特区身份证，并在香港拥有多处房产。
description.en: Chinese businesswoman, granddaughter of Xi Zhongxun, one of the Eight Great Eminent Officials of the CCP, and daughter of Xi Jinping's sister Qi Qiaoqiao, making her Xi Jinping's niece. She holds a Hong Kong SAR ID card and owns multiple properties in Hong Kong.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国前主要领导人之一，被列为中共八大元老之一。他是习近平和齐桥桥的父亲。
description.en: A former key leader of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, listed as one of the Eight Great Eminent Officials of the CCP. He is the father of Xi Jinping and Qi Qiaoqiao.

description.zh-cn: 习仲勋的妻子，习近平和齐桥桥的母亲。
description.en: Wife of Xi Zhongxun, and mother of Xi Jinping and Qi Qiaoqiao.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会总书记，中华人民共和国现任最高领导人。
description.en: General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China and the current paramount leader of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 习近平的姐姐，习仲勋与齐心的女儿，张燕南的母亲。
description.en: Xi Jinping's elder sister, daughter of Xi Zhongxun and Qi Xin, and mother of Zhang Yannan.

description.zh-cn: 齐桥桥的前夫，张燕南的父亲。
description.en: Ex-husband of Qi Qiaoqiao and father of Zhang Yannan.

description.zh-cn: 北京合康亿盛变频科技公司的创始人。
description.en: Founder of Beijing Hiconics Eco-energy Technology Co., Ltd.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的首都。
description.en: The capital of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 香港的豪华住宅区。
description.en: An affluent residential area in Hong Kong.

description.zh-cn: 位于香港市区的豪宅。
description.en: A luxury residential building in urban Hong Kong.

en: Eight Great Eminent Officials of the CCP

description.zh-cn: 指在1980年代至1990年代间在中华人民共和国政治决策中拥有非正式影响力的元老政治家群体。
description.en: Refers to a group of elder statesmen who held informal influence over political decision-making in the People's Republic of China during the 1980s and 1990s.

en: General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的最高负责人职位。
description.en: The highest-ranking official position within the Communist Party of China.

nodes.id: 北京合康亿盛变频科技公司

zh-cn: 北京合康亿盛变频科技公司
en: Beijing Hiconics Eco-energy Technology Co., Ltd.

description.zh-cn: 张燕南是北京人。
description.en: Zhang Yannan is from Beijing.

description.zh-cn: 张燕南是习仲勋的外孙女。
description.en: Zhang Yannan is the granddaughter of Xi Zhongxun.

description.zh-cn: 张燕南是齐心的外孙女。
description.en: Zhang Yannan is the granddaughter of Qi Xin.

description.zh-cn: 张燕南是习近平的外甥女。
description.en: Zhang Yannan is the niece of Xi Jinping.

description.zh-cn: 齐桥桥是习近平的姐姐。
description.en: Qi Qiaoqiao is Xi Jinping's elder sister.

description.zh-cn: 张楚是齐桥桥的前夫。
description.en: Zhang Chu is the ex-husband of Qi Qiaoqiao.

description.zh-cn: 习仲勋是中共八大元老之一。
description.en: Xi Zhongxun was one of the Eight Great Eminent Officials of the CCP.

description.zh-cn: 习近平担任中共中央总书记。
description.en: Xi Jinping serves as the General Secretary of the Central Committee of the CCP.

relationships.target: 北京合康亿盛变频科技公司

description.zh-cn: 2009年，张燕南作为七名股东之一，对北京合康亿盛变频科技公司投资3百多万元，至2012年该笔投资价值达到1亿2千多万元。
description.en: In 2009, as one of seven shareholders, Zhang Yannan invested over 3 million yuan in Beijing Hiconics Eco-energy Technology, which grew to a value of over 120 million yuan by 2012.

relationships.target: 北京合康亿盛变频科技公司

description.zh-cn: 刘锦成是北京合康亿盛变频科技公司的创始人。
description.en: Liu Jincheng is the founder of Beijing Hiconics Eco-energy Technology Co., Ltd.

description.zh-cn: 刘锦成和齐桥桥曾就读于清华大学同一个EMBA班。
description.en: Liu Jincheng and Qi Qiaoqiao were classmates in the same EMBA program at Tsinghua University.

description.zh-cn: 香港公司注册处资料显示，张燕南持有进意公司。
description.en: According to the Hong Kong Companies Registry, Zhang Yannan holds Jin Yi Company.

description.zh-cn: 张燕南于2004年在香港浅水湾以2048万港币购入一个自住公寓，并于2009年以一次性付款1.5亿港币购入一栋三层楼别墅。
description.en: Zhang Yannan purchased a residential apartment in Repulse Bay, Hong Kong for 20.48 million HKD in 2004, and a three-story villa for 150 million HKD in a single payment in 2009.

description.zh-cn: 张燕南持有的进意公司报住地址为香港豪宅会景阁。
description.en: The registered address for Jin Yi Company, held by Zhang Yannan, is at the luxury residential building Convention Plaza Apartments in Hong Kong.
